overview:
Darlene Liebman is the Co-Founder & Vice President of Production at Howcast. She began her career in feature films and has since focused on television and web-based production. Prior to Howcast, at Nickelodeon, Liebman produced videos for SpongeBob Square Pants and The Fairly Odd Parents while working in the on-air promotions department. At Howcast, Liebman is responsible for running Howcast’s studios and building a community for emerging directors. Liebman graduated from Lehigh University.

Source:Howcast
